complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down branding updates into: package.json updates, layout.tsx metadata changes, Korean language configuration in next.config.ts, and README rebranding. Each subtask should be specific and testable.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Low complexity - mostly configuration file updates. Project already has proper structure, just needs rebranding. Korean support requires next.config.ts i18n setup.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: user profiles table, investment_profiles table, companies table with Korean text support, events/recommendations tables, RLS policies setup, and database migration scripts. Focus on proper PostgreSQL schema design with indexes and constraints.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - requires deep PostgreSQL knowledge, RLS policies, Korean text collation, and complex relationships. No existing schema to build on.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: quiz UI component using existing shadcn/ui patterns, multi-step form logic, Korean translation integration, risk profiling algorithm, and Supabase integration for storing results. Leverage existing form patterns.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity - multi-step form with complex logic. Can leverage existing shadcn/ui components and form patterns, but requires assessment algorithm development.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Company Data Models and API Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: TypeScript interfaces for company data, API route implementation, Korea Investment & Securities API integration, data validation layer, error handling, and real-time updates. Focus on 485+ company data management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - external API integration with 485+ companies, real-time data, TypeScript modeling, and robust error handling. No existing API patterns to follow.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: collaborative filtering algorithm, content-based filtering for biotech categories, confidence scoring system, recommendation API endpoints, data preprocessing pipeline, performance optimization, and Korean language result formatting.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity - requires ML algorithms, complex data processing, and performance considerations. No existing recommendation infrastructure to build on.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: tabbed interface using shadcn/ui, responsive layout implementation, real-time stock chart integration, financial metrics display, and Korean biotech terminology support. Leverage existing UI component patterns.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity - complex UI with real-time data. Can use existing shadcn/ui patterns and responsive design, but requires chart integration and financial data display.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate DART API for Regulatory Filings
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: DART API client implementation, authentication setup, document parsing pipeline, Korean regulatory data processing, database storage integration, and real-time update mechanism.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - external Korean regulatory API with document parsing, authentication, and real-time processing. Requires understanding of Korean regulatory framework.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: charting library selection and setup, real-time data connection, technical indicators implementation (RSI, OBV, MFI), buy/sell signal visualization, mobile responsiveness, and Korean market hours handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - real-time charting with technical indicators and signal processing. Requires financial domain knowledge and performance optimization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: KIPRIS API client development, Korean patent document parsing, patent-to-company linking logic, data processing pipeline, API rate limiting compliance, and Korean IP terminology handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - specialized Korean IP API with complex document parsing and data relationships. Requires understanding of patent data structures.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: glossary database schema design, tooltip component development using existing UI patterns, Korean translation management system, and platform-wide integration for 200+ terms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity - data-driven feature with UI components. Can leverage existing database and UI patterns, but requires comprehensive Korean translation work.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: event detection pipeline architecture, global regulatory API integrations (FDA, etc.), event impact scoring algorithm, alert generation system, real-time processing infrastructure, Korean event description translation, and 24/7 monitoring setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity - requires real-time processing, multiple API integrations, ML-based impact scoring, and global monitoring infrastructure. Most complex task in the project.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: Firebase Cloud Messaging setup, notification preferences UI, personalized filtering logic, cross-platform delivery implementation, Korean notification text formatting, and user subscription management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - cross-platform notifications with personalization. Requires Firebase integration, complex filtering logic, and mobile considerations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create User Watchlist and Portfolio Tracking
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: watchlist CRUD interface using existing UI patterns, portfolio calculation logic, real-time price update integration, Korean currency formatting, and basic analytics dashboard components.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity - financial calculations with real-time data. Can leverage existing CRUD patterns and UI components, but requires financial logic and real-time updates.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement News Aggregation and Sentiment Analysis
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: news aggregation pipeline from multiple sources, BioBERT sentiment analysis integration, Korean and global news source configuration, news-to-company linking algorithm, relevance ranking system, and real-time update mechanism.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - requires ML integration (BioBERT), multi-source aggregation, and sophisticated ranking algorithms. Korean language processing adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: card-based recommendation display using existing UI patterns, filtering functionality implementation, confidence score visualization, and Korean explanation text integration. Leverage existing shadcn/ui components.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity - primarily UI development with filtering. Can leverage existing card components and patterns, but requires recommendation data integration and Korean text support.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: ClinicalTrials.gov API client implementation, trial data processing pipeline, trial-to-company linking logic, Korean translation of trial information, and real-time trial status monitoring.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - external medical API with complex data structures and regulatory requirements. Korean translation of medical terms adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: dashboard layout design using existing patterns, personalized content aggregation, responsive navigation with Korean menu items, and performance optimization for dashboard loading. Leverage existing layout and navigation patterns.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity - UI assembly task using existing components. Can leverage existing patterns and responsive design, but requires integration of multiple data sources.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: settings UI implementation using existing form patterns, preference persistence in Supabase, notification preference management, and Korean language settings interface. Build on existing authentication and form patterns.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity - standard settings page with database persistence. Can leverage existing form components and Supabase patterns, straightforward CRUD operations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: Redis caching implementation, API rate limiting setup, image optimization and lazy loading, service worker for offline capability, performance monitoring integration, and load testing infrastructure.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity - requires infrastructure changes, caching strategies, and performance engineering. No existing caching or optimization patterns to build on.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for: Vercel deployment configuration, environment variable setup, Sentry error tracking integration, Vercel Analytics configuration, and monitoring alerts setup. Focus on production-ready deployment pipeline.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity - deployment and monitoring setup. Straightforward Vercel deployment but requires proper monitoring, error tracking, and production configuration.
